title: Donald Trump's Renovations to White House Rose Garden Stir Up Strong Reactions
description: The president recently transformed the Rose Garden lawn into a paved patio space.

Donald Trump's Renovations to White House Rose Garden Stir Up Strong Reactions originally appeared on Parade.

It's not just Donald Trump's decisions inside the Oval Office that have been dividing the nation—now it's changes to the outside of the White House that are stirring up debate.

After the president decided to have the famous White House Rose Garden lawn paved over with concrete, users on the internet are having strong reactions to the look of the new renovations.

🎬SIGN UP for Parade's Daily newsletter to get the latest pop culture news & celebrity interviews delivered right to your inbox🎬

New photos of the revamped space outside the iconic U.S. landmark show what was formerly a green lawn space has now been transformed into a paved patio area, complete with several sets of white tables and chairs paired with striped yellow umbrellas.

After the photos of the renovations went viral online, fans on social media have had mixed reactions to the new space, with some supporters admitting they "love" the look of the transformation—but others aren't so convinced.

"This looks so tacky," one user wrote on Instagram after seeing the photos, comparing the new space to the looks of a "gas station rest stop."

"Destroyed an iconic feature of American history," another user lamented, while others critics chimed in with more disapproving comments to call the new look "tacky and cold" and "ridiculous."

Some users also pointed out that the new yellow umbrellas Trump had installed look notably similar to the umbrellas outside his Mar-a-Lago home in Florida.

"Certainly doesn't seem like he plans on leaving," one user wrote on X (formerly Twitter). Another person called the new decor "genuinely hideous," while someone else said the whole area looks "tacky and cheap."

Donald Trump's Renovations to White House Rose Garden Stir Up Strong Reactions first appeared on Parade on Aug 8, 2025

This story was originally reported by Parade on Aug 8, 2025, where it first appeared.

The White House Rose Garden has been transformed into a paved patio area, with several sets of white tables and chairs paired with striped yellow umbrellas. After the photos of the renovations went viral, social media users have mixed reactions, with some calling the new look "tacky and cold" and "ridiculous."
shortSummary: Donald Trump's controversial renovations to the White House Rose Garden have sparked mixed reactions, with some calling it tacky and others calling it ridiculous.
argos_summary: Donald Trump's recent renovations to the White House Rose Garden, which involved paving over the lawn with concrete and adding patio furniture and yellow umbrellas, have sparked a strong and mixed reaction online. While some supporters appreciate the new look, many critics have labeled it as 'tacky' and 'ridiculous,' comparing it unfavorably to a gas station rest stop. The changes have ignited debates about the preservation of iconic American landmarks.
